alert.note: Alert for Bourbon (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 10:35AM EST until further notice by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Stoner Creek at Paris affecting Bourbon County. .Heavy rain from the past few days has caused the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Stoner Creek at Paris. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water enter yards of homes downstream of water plant. Parts of the Garrard Park flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 20.9 feet this afternoon and then fall tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.5 feet on 02/13/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this evening.
